history.proof: intros A e. unfold agree. intros x a. destruct x. - sauto lq: on depth: 3use: insert_nil. - qsimpl time: 1 use: insert_nil.

exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (A : Type) (e : env A), agree (empty A) e 0

Premises:
env = fun A : Type => list (option A) : Type -> Type Arguments env _%type_scope
empty : forall A : Type, env A
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula Arguments Tauto.GFormula {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.TT {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.FF {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.X {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.A {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.Cj {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.D {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.N {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.I {TA TX AA AF}%
agree : forall A : Type, env A -> env A -> nat -> Prop
raw_insert_zero : forall (A : Type) (o : option A) (e : env A), raw_insert 0 o e = o :: e
fold_invariant : forall (A B : Type) (P : env A -> B -> Prop) (f : option A -> B -> B) (accu : B), P (empty A) accu -> (forall (o : option A) (e : env A) (accu0 : B), P e accu0 -> P (raw_insert 0 o e) (f o accu0)) -> forall e : env A, P e (fold f e accu)
raw_insert_successor : forall (A : Type) (x : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), raw_insert (S x) o e = lookup 0 e :: raw_insert x o (tl e)
insert_nil : forall (A : Type) (x : nat) (a : A) (e : env A), insert x a e = nil -> False
empty_eq_insert : forall (A : Type) (x : nat) (o : A) (e : env A), empty A = insert x o e -> False
defined_implies_below_length : forall (A : Type) (e : env A) (x k : nat) (a : A), length e <= k -> lookup x e = Some a -> x < k
lookup_shift_insert : forall (A : Type) (x y : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), lookup (shift y x) (raw_insert y o e) = lookup x e
length_insert_reverse_2 : forall (A : Type) (e : env A) (k x : nat) (a : A), length (insert x a e) <= k + 1 -> length e <= k
lookup_insert_recent : forall (A : Type) (x y : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), x < y -> lookup x (raw_insert y o e) = lookup x e
lookup_beyond_length : forall (A : Type) (e : env A) (x : nat), length e <= x -> lookup x e = None
lookup_insert_old : forall (A : Type) (x y : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), x > y -> lookup x (raw_insert y o e) = lookup (x - 1) e
lookup_successor : forall (A : Type) (x : nat) (e : env A), lookup (S x) e = lookup x (tl e)
length_map_general : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (e : env A), length (map f e) = length e
lookup_empty_Some : forall (A : Type) (x : nat) (a : A), lookup x (empty A) = Some a -> False
length_insert_general : forall (A : Type) (x k : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), length e = k -> length (raw_insert x o e) = mymax (1 + k) (1 + x)
length_monotonic : forall (A : Type) (e : env A) (k1 k2 : nat), length e <= k1 -> k1 <= k2 -> length e <= k2
map_map_vanish : forall (A B : Type) (f : B -> A) (g : A -> B) (e : env A), (forall x : A, f (g x) = x) -> map f (map g e) = e
length_insert : forall (A : Type) (x k km1 : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), length e <= km1 -> km1 <= k - 1 -> x < k -> length (raw_insert x o e) <= k
fold_insert : forall (A B : Type) (f : option A -> B -> B) (o : option A) (e : env A) (accu : B), fold f (raw_insert 0 o e) accu = f o (fold f e accu)
agree_below : forall (A : Type) (e1 e2 : env A) (x : nat) (a : A) (k : nat), lookup x e1 = Some a -> x < k -> agree e1 e2 k -> lookup x e2 = Some a
length_insert_reverse_1 : forall (A : Type) (e : env A) (k x : nat) (a : A), length (insert x a e) <= k -> x < k
length_map : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (e : env A) (k : nat), length e <= k -> length (map f e) <= k
lookup_insert_bingo : forall (A : Type) (x y : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), x = y -> lookup x (raw_insert y o e) = o
length_empty : forall (A : Type) (k : nat), length (empty A) <= k
lookup_map_some : forall (A B : Type) (x : nat) (a : A) (e : env A) (f : A -> B), lookup x e = Some a -> lookup x (map f e) = Some (f a)
lookup_map_none : forall (A B : Type) (x : nat) (e : env A) (f : A -> B), lookup x e = None -> lookup x (map f e) = None
lookup_empty_None : forall (A : Type) (x : nat), lookup x (empty A) = None
length_insert_independent : forall (A : Type) (e : env A) (k x : nat) (a : A), length (insert x a e) <= k -> forall (y : nat) (o : option A), y < k -> length (raw_insert y o e) <= k
insert_eq_insert_3 : forall (A : Type) (x1 x2 : nat) (a1 a2 : A) (e1 e2 : env A), insert x1 a1 e1 = insert x2 a2 e2 -> x1 <> x2 -> exists (e : env A) (y1 y2 : nat), e1 = insert y1 a2 e /\ e2 = insert y2 a1 e /\ shift x1 y1 = x2 /\ y2 = (if le_gt_dec x1 y1 then x1 else x1 - 1)
map_insert : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (x : nat) (a : A) (e : env A), map f (insert x a e) = insert x (f a) (map f e)
map_empty : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B), map f (empty A) = empty B
map_map_fuse : forall (A B C : Type) (f : B -> C) (g : A -> B) (h : A -> C) (e : env A), (forall d : A, f (g d) = h d) -> map f (map g e) = map h e
insert_insert : forall (A : Type) (k s : nat) (a b : option A) (e : env A), k <= s -> raw_insert k a (raw_insert s b e) = raw_insert (1 + s) b (raw_insert k a e)
map_insert_eq : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (x : nat) (a : A) (b : B) (e : env A), f a = b -> map f (insert x a e) = insert x b (map f e)
lookup_map_some_reverse : forall (A B : Type) (x : nat) (b : B) (e : env A) (f : A -> B), lookup x (map f e) = Some b -> exists a : A, lookup x e = Some a /\ b = f a
fold_empty : forall (A B : Type) (f : option A -> B -> B) (accu : B), fold f (empty A) accu = accu
map_insert_map : forall (A : Type) (f g h : A -> A) (x : nat) (a : A) (e : env A), (forall a0 : A, f (g a0) = g (h a0)) -> map f (insert x a (map g e)) = insert x (f a) (map g (map h e))
insert_insert_always : forall (A : Type) (k s : nat) (a b : option A) (e : env A), raw_insert k a (raw_insert s b e) = raw_insert (shift k s) b (raw_insert (if le_gt_dec k s then k else k - 1) a e)
map_raw_insert : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (x : nat) (e : env A), map f (raw_insert x None e) = raw_insert x None (map f e)
insert_eq_insert_1 : forall (A : Type) (x : nat) (a1 a2 : A) (e1 e2 : env A), insert x a1 e1 = insert x a2 e2 -> a1 = a2

```coq
intros A e. unfold agree. intros x a. destruct x.
- intros k H. simpl. auto.
- intros k H. simpl. apply insert_nil in H. contradiction.
Qed.```

original: intros A e. unfold agree. intros x a. destruct x. - intros k H. simpl. auto. - intros k H. simpl. apply insert_nil in H. contradiction.
